p: A few chemical constituents were reported from C. europaea, including flavone glycosides such as luteolin 4′-neohesperidoside, luteolin-3′-O-(6′-O-sinapoylglucoside)-4′-O-neohesperidoside, and luteolin-3′-O-(6′-O-feruloylglucoside)-4′-O-neohesperidoside; monoterpenoids; α-terpinene; linalool; and terpinolene [ 5, 8].
